parameters.name: gooddata_project_creation_token
parameters.description: Token needed for creation of the project. Based on that we can attribute projects to customers.

parameters.name: gooddata_project_spec_uri
parameters.description: Tells us where the specification lives. It can be either URI or a local path.

parameters.name: gooddata_projec_spec_type
parameters.description: Tells us what type of the specification we have. Currently supported are "rb" and "json".

parameters.name: gooddata_project_spec
parameters.description: Specification can be provided inline using JSON syntax.

parameters.name: download_objects_type
parameters.description: Can contain values 'atribute', 'metric', 'fact', 'all'. By specifying you can constrain the type of objects being exported.

parameters.name: download_objects_output_file
parameters.description: Path to file where to store the results

parameters.name: download_objects_type
parameters.description: Can contain values 'atribute', 'metric', 'fact', 'all'. By specifying you can constrain the type of objects being exported.

parameters.name: download_objects_output_file
parameters.description: Path to file where to store the results

name: hello_world
description: This brick will load data into a dataset of the project.

parameters.name: load_data_brick_dataset
parameters.description: Dataset of a gooddata project to be loaded.

parameters.name: load_data_brick_path
parameters.description: Where to find the file with data or inline the data. currently only comma separated, " quoted, CSV format with header is supported.

parameters.name: load_data_brick_dataset
parameters.description: Dataset of a gooddata project to be loaded.

parameters.name: load_data_brick_path
parameters.description: Where to find the file with data or inline the data. currently only comma separated, " quoted, CSV format with header is supported.

parameters.name: mass_object_update_input_file
parameters.description: Path to file where to read the values from
